name: Sa(N)D Hope
description:
You are a space Ant, crashed on the planet of trolls. Once in the sand trap, you have to get out and get back to your spaceship to return home.

SpaceY (the company of the ant development Center for the study of distant galaxies (ICRIDG)). We sent an ant into space to study galaxies, but at one point the ant crashed! And he fell into the Troll's house right into the hourglass, now his life depends only on him, whether he can get out of the hourglass!
